title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Legendary Flannel Shirt
description: RELAXED STRETCH FIT: The Legendary Stretch Flannel Shirt is designed with the same relaxed fit as our other shirts. In addition, it has a raised back yoke, and premium stretch fabric to give you full range of motion… even at full draw!

SNUGGLY SOFT: This flannel shirt features premium brushed cotton fabric with a touch of Spandex to give you ultimate comfort and flexibility. Furthermore, with the super soft suede knit lining at the collar and cuffs, you're sure to receive extra cuddles!
DURABLE QUALITY: Our custom suede knit lined collar and cuffs not only look cool, but add stablility... which means they will hold their shape so you don't have to iron!

UPDATED STYLE: We made this men's flannel shirt with convertible pocket flaps that tuck in for overflow storage, perfect for oversized smartphones. Or, they can be worn as traditional flap pockets, buttoned to secure your belongings.
Wash:Machine wash cold separately. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly. Low iron

The Men's Legendary Flannel Shirt is the ultimate shirt for all your indoor and outdoor activities. We engineered it with the same relaxed fit as our other shirts, then raised the back yoke and added stretch to achieve a custom fit that gives you full range of motion without any tugging or pulling... even at full draw! Additional features include convertible pocket flaps that can be buttoned or tucked in, and super soft suede knit lined collar and cuffs. If you like our Buck Camp Flannel Shirt , you're going to love the new Legendary Flannel!
